medical_history.chief_complaint: Nausea and abdominal pain with diarrhea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms of nausea and chills started 4 days ago. Abdominal pain developed last night and was associated with diarrhea. The patient thought her symptoms were consistent with prior history of ovarian cysts. Pain persisted, leading to evaluation at the emergency department.
medical_history.past_medical_history: SVT s/p ablation as a child; jaw surgery; cardiac ablation for SVT.
